bibliography.author: Husain, D.
Marshall, P.
bibliography.title: Determination of absolute rate data for the reaction of atomic sodium, Na(3^2S_1_/_2), with CF_3Cl, CF_2Cl_2, CFCl_3, CF_3Br and SF_6 as a function of temperature by time-resolved atomic resonance-absorption spectroscopy at λ = 589nm [Na(3^2P_J) ← Na(3^2S_1_/_2)]
